query.statement:
SELECT A.ARA, A.ARA_NM, A.BSU, A.BSU_NM, A.BPM, A.BPM_NM, A.TEM, A.TEM_NM, A.JUJ, A.JUJ_NM, A.PJT, A.SPT, A.NAM, A.EL, A.ES, A.WW, A.EL_H, A.ES_H, A.WW_H, A.MI, A.MI_H, A.MI_D, A.MI_M, A.ME, A.ME_H, A.ME_D, A.ME_M, A.UE, A.UE_H, A.UE_D, A.UE_M, A.MG, A.MG_H, A.MG_D, A.MG_M, A.MO, A.MO_H, A.MO_D, A.MO_M, A.UG, A.UG_H, A.UG_D, A.UG_M, A.UO, A.UO_H, A.UO_D, A.UO_M, A.KND, A.SLA, A.JHD, A.SID FROM ( SELECT A.ARA, A.ARA_NM, A.BSU, A.BSU_NM, A.BPM, A.BPM_NM, A.TEM, A.TEM_NM, A.JUJ, A.JUJ_NM, A.PJT, A.SPT, A.NAM, A.EL, A.ES, A.WW, A.EL_H, A.ES_H, A.WW_H, A.MI, A.MI_H, A.MI_D, CASE WHEN A.MI_D > '' THEN SAPHEE.MONTH_BETWEEN(A.MI_D,CAST(#GIJUN# AS VARCHAR(8)),'1') ELSE 0 END MI_M, A.ME, A.ME_H, A.ME_D, CASE WHEN A.ME_D > '' THEN SAPHEE.MONTH_BETWEEN(A.ME_D,CAST(#GIJUN# AS VARCHAR(8)),'1') ELSE 0 END ME_M, A.UE, A.UE_H, A.UE_D, CASE WHEN A.UE_D > '' THEN SAPHEE.MONTH_BETWEEN(A.UE_D,CAST(#GIJUN# AS VARCHAR(8)),'1') ELSE 0 END UE_M, A.MG, A.MG_H, A.MG_D, CASE WHEN A.MG_D > '' THEN SAPHEE.MONTH_BETWEEN(CAST(#GIJUN# AS VARCHAR(8)),A.MG_D,'1') ELSE 0 END MG_M, A.MO, A.MO_H, A.MO_D, CASE WHEN A.MO_D > '' THEN SAPHEE.MONTH_BETWEEN(CAST(#GIJUN# AS VARCHAR(8)),A.MO_D,'1') ELSE 0 END MO_M, A.UG, A.UG_H, A.UG_D, CASE WHEN A.UG_D > '' THEN SAPHEE.MONTH_BETWEEN(CAST(#GIJUN# AS VARCHAR(8)),A.UG_D,'1') ELSE 0 END UG_M, A.UO, A.UO_H, A.UO_D, CASE WHEN A.UO_D > '' THEN SAPHEE.MONTH_BETWEEN(CAST(#GIJUN# AS VARCHAR(8)),A.UO_D,'1') ELSE 0 END UO_M, CASE WHEN A.KND > '' THEN 'FM' ELSE '' END KND, CASE WHEN A.SLA = 'Y' THEN '¿ë¿ª' ELSE '' END SLA, A.JHD, A.SID FROM ( SELECT A.ARA, VALUE(MAX(B.CTEXT2),'') ARA_NM, A.BSU, VALUE(MAX(C.ABR_NM),'') BSU_NM, MAX(C.VKGRP) TEM, SAPHEE.CODE_CONV(#G_MANDT#, #G_LANG#, 'VKGRP', MAX(C.VKGRP)) AS TEM_NM, A.JUJ, VALUE(MAX(D.USERNAME),'') JUJ_NM, A.BPM, VALUE(MAX(E.USERNAME),'') BPM_NM, A.PJT, VALUE(MAX(A.SPT),'') SPT, VALUE(MAX(A.NAM),'') NAM, SUM(CASE WHEN SUBSTR(A.HNO,1,1) IN ('L','C') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) EL, SUM(CASE WHEN SUBSTR(A.HNO,1,1) = 'S' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) ES, SUM(CASE WHEN SUBSTR(A.HNO,1,1) = 'W' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) WW, SUM(CASE WHEN SUBSTR(A.HNO,1,1) IN ('L','C') THEN A.CNT_H ELSE 0 END) EL_H, SUM(CASE WHEN SUBSTR(A.HNO,1,1) = 'S' THEN A.CNT_H ELSE 0 END) ES_H, SUM(CASE WHEN SUBSTR(A.HNO,1,1) = 'W' THEN A.CNT_H ELSE 0 END) WW_H, SUM(CASE WHEN A.STATUS = 'MG' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) MG, SUM(CASE WHEN A.STATUS = 'MG' THEN A.CNT_H ELSE 0 END) MG_H, VALUE(MAX(CASE WHEN A.STATUS = 'MG' THEN A.EDATE ELSE '' END),'') MG_D, SUM(CASE WHEN A.STATUS = 'MO' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) MO, SUM(CASE WHEN A.STATUS = 'MO' THEN A.CNT_H ELSE 0 END) MO_H, VALUE(MAX(CASE WHEN A.STATUS = 'MO' THEN A.EDATE ELSE '' END),'') MO_D, SUM(CASE WHEN A.STATUS = 'UG' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) UG, SUM(CASE WHEN A.STATUS = 'UG' THEN A.CNT_H ELSE 0 END) UG_H, VALUE(MAX(CASE WHEN A.STATUS = 'UG' THEN A.EDATE ELSE '' END),'') UG_D, SUM(CASE WHEN A.STATUS = 'UO' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) UO, SUM(CASE WHEN A.STATUS = 'UO' THEN A.CNT_H ELSE 0 END) UO_H, VALUE(MAX(CASE WHEN A.STATUS = 'UO' THEN A.EDATE ELSE '' END),'') UO_D, SUM(CASE WHEN A.STATUS = 'MI' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) MI, SUM(CASE WHEN A.STATUS = 'MI' THEN A.CNT_H ELSE 0 END) MI_H, VALUE(MAX(CASE WHEN A.STATUS = 'MI' THEN A.EDATE ELSE '' END),'') MI_D, SUM(CASE WHEN A.STATUS = 'ME' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) ME, SUM(CASE WHEN A.STATUS = 'ME' THEN A.CNT_H ELSE 0 END) ME_H, VALUE(MAX(CASE WHEN A.STATUS = 'ME' THEN A.EDATE ELSE '' END),'') ME_D, SUM(CASE WHEN A.STATUS = 'UE' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) UE, SUM(CASE WHEN A.STATUS = 'UE' THEN A.CNT_H ELSE 0 END) UE_H, VALUE(MAX(CASE WHEN A.STATUS = 'UE' THEN A.EDATE ELSE '' END),'') UE_D, VALUE(MAX(A.KND),'') KND, VALUE(MAX(A.SLA),'') SLA, VALUE(MAX(A.JHD),'') JHD, VALUE(MAX(A.SID),'') SID FROM ( SELECT A.CS101_ARA ARA, VALUE(B.GBU,'') GBU, VALUE(B.BSU,'') BSU, VALUE(B.JUJ,'') JUJ, VALUE(B.BPM,'') BPM, A.CS101_PJT PJT, A.CS101_HNO HNO, CASE WHEN VALUE(T.CS121_SPT,'') = '' THEN VALUE(Z1.ZSITE_NM,'') ELSE VALUE(T.CS121_SPT,'') END SPT, VALUE(T.CS121_NAM,'') NAM, CASE WHEN VALUE(F.CS126_PJT,'') <> '' THEN 'UO' WHEN VALUE(E.CS126_PJT,'') <> '' THEN 'UG' WHEN VALUE(D.CS116_PJT,'') <> '' THEN 'MO' WHEN VALUE(C.CS116_PJT,'') <> '' THEN 'MG' WHEN VALUE(H.PJT,'') <> '' THEN 'UE' WHEN VALUE(G.PJT,'') <> '' THEN 'ME' ELSE 'MI' END STATUS, CASE WHEN VALUE(F.CS126_PJT,'') <> '' THEN F.CS126_UHJ WHEN VALUE(E.CS126_PJT,'') <> '' THEN E.CS126_UHJ WHEN VALUE(D.CS116_PJT,'') <> '' THEN D.CS116_BMT WHEN VALUE(C.CS116_PJT,'') <> '' THEN C.CS116_BMT WHEN VALUE(H.PJT,'') <> '' THEN H.UHJ WHEN VALUE(G.PJT,'') <> '' THEN G.BMT ELSE A.CS101_IGD END EDATE, CASE WHEN Z.ZZGUBUN IN ('10','13') AND INT(CASE Z.ZSPEC7 WHEN '' THEN '0' ELSE Z.ZSPEC7 END) <= 10 THEN 0.8 WHEN Z.ZZGUBUN IN ('10','13') AND INT(CASE Z.ZSPEC7 WHEN '' THEN '0' ELSE Z.ZSPEC7 END) > 10 THEN 1 - ((15 - INT(CASE Z.ZSPEC7 WHEN '' THEN '0' ELSE Z.ZSPEC7 END)) * 0.04) WHEN Z.ZZGUBUN IN ('11','12','14') THEN 1.8 ELSE 0 END CNT_H, CASE WHEN VALUE(F.CS126_PJT,'') <> '' THEN F.CS126_KND WHEN VALUE(E.CS126_PJT,'') <> '' THEN E.CS126_KND ELSE '' END KND, CASE WHEN VALUE(F.CS126_PJT,'') <> '' THEN F.CS126_SLA WHEN VALUE(E.CS126_PJT,'') <> '' THEN E.CS126_SLA ELSE '' END SLA, VALUE(I.JHD,'') JHD, VALUE(B.SID,'') SID FROM SAPHEE.ZCST101 A LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZCST111 B ON A.MANDT = B.MANDT AND A.CS101_PJT = B.PJT AND A.CS101_HNO = B.HNO LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZCST116 C ON B.MANDT = C.MANDT AND B.PJT = C.CS116_PJT AND B.HNO = C.CS116_HNO AND C.CS116_PST = 'A6' AND C.CS116_GND = 'A' AND #GIJUN# BETWEEN C.CS116_BGT AND C.CS116_BMT AND C.CS116_BST <= #GIJUN# LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZCST116 D ON B.MANDT = D.MANDT AND B.PJT = D.CS116_PJT AND B.HNO = D.CS116_HNO AND D.CS116_PST = 'A6' AND D.CS116_GND = 'B' AND #GIJUN# BETWEEN D.CS116_BGT AND D.CS116_BMT AND D.CS116_BST <= #GIJUN# LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZCST126 E ON B.MANDT = E.MANDT AND B.PJT = E.CS126_PJT AND B.HNO = E.CS126_HNO AND E.CS126_PST = 'A6' AND E.CS126_DDT = '' AND E.CS126_GND = 'C' AND #GIJUN# BETWEEN E.CS126_USD AND E.CS126_UHJ AND E.CS126_ADT <= #GIJUN# LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZCST126 F ON B.MANDT = F.MANDT AND B.PJT = F.CS126_PJT AND B.HNO = F.CS126_HNO AND F.CS126_PST = 'A6' AND F.CS126_DDT = '' AND F.CS126_GND = 'D' AND #GIJUN# BETWEEN F.CS126_USD AND F.CS126_UHJ AND F.CS126_ADT <= #GIJUN# LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT CS116_PJT PJT, CS116_HNO HNO, MAX(CS116_BMT) BMT FROM SAPHEE.ZCST116 WHERE MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND CS116_PST = 'A6' AND CS116_GND = 'B' AND CS116_BMT < #GIJUN# AND CS116_BST <= #GIJUN# GROUP BY CS116_PJT, CS116_HNO ) G ON B.PJT = G.PJT AND B.HNO = G.HNO LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT CS126_PJT PJT, CS126_HNO HNO, MAX(CS126_UHJ) UHJ FROM SAPHEE.ZCST126 WHERE MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND CS126_PST = 'A6' AND CS126_DDT = '' AND CS126_GND = 'D' AND CS126_UHJ < #GIJUN# AND CS126_ADT <= #GIJUN# GROUP BY CS126_PJT, CS126_HNO ) H ON B.PJT = H.PJT AND B.HNO = H.HNO LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZMASTER02 Z ON A.MANDT = Z.MANDT AND A.CS101_PJT = Z.POSID AND A.CS101_HNO = SUBSTR(Z.POSID_1,7,3) AND Z.POSID_1 NOT IN ('N10914L100', 'N10914L101','N10914L102','N10914L103') LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZMASTER01 Z1 ON A.MANDT = Z1.MANDT AND A.CS101_PJT = Z1.POSID LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZCST121 T ON B.MANDT = T.MANDT AND B.UPN = T.CS121_UPN AND B.CST = T.CS121_CST LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT A.PJT, A.HNO, A.JHD FROM ( SELECT A.CS144_PJT PJT, A.CS144_HNO HNO, A.CS144_PST PST, B.CS143_JHD JHD, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY A.CS144_PJT, A.CS144_HNO ORDER BY B.CS143_JHD DESC) ROWN FROM SAPHEE.ZCST144 A INNER JOIN SAPHEE.ZCST143 B ON A.MANDT = B.MANDT AND A.CS144_SEQ = B.CS143_SEQ WHERE A.MANDT = #G_MANDT# ) A WHERE A.ROWN = 1 AND A.PST BETWEEN 'A1' AND 'A5' ) I ON B.PJT = I.PJT AND B.HNO = I.HNO LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT CS144_PJT PJT, CS144_HNO HNO, MAX(CS143_FSD) JHD FROM SAPHEE.ZCST144 A, SAPHEE.ZCST143 B WHERE A.MANDT = B.MANDT AND A.CS144_SEQ = B.CS143_SEQ AND A.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND A.CS144_PST = 'A6' GROUP BY CS144_PJT, CS144_HNO ) J ON B.PJT = J.PJT AND B.HNO = J.HNO LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT CS172_PJO PJO, CS172_HNO HNO, MAX(CS172_MDT) MDT FROM SAPHEE.ZCST172 WHERE MANDT = #G_MANDT# GROUP BY CS172_PJO, CS172_HNO ) K ON B.PJT = K.PJO AND B.HNO = K.HNO WHERE A.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND A.CS101_IGD <= #GIJUN# AND (A.CS101_PJT NOT LIKE 'M%' OR (A.CS101_PJT LIKE 'M%' AND (VALUE(C.CS116_BMT,'') > '' OR VALUE(D.CS116_BMT,'') > '' OR VALUE(E.CS126_UHJ,'') > '' OR VALUE(F.CS126_UHJ,'') > '' OR VALUE(H.UHJ,'') > ''))) AND A.CS101_ARA > '' AND SUBSTR(A.CS101_HNO,1,1) NOT IN ('J','G') AND VALUE(B.EXC,'') = '' AND A.MDATE <= #GIJUN# AND (VALUE(C.CS116_BMT,'') > VALUE(J.JHD,'') OR VALUE(D.CS116_BMT,'') > VALUE(J.JHD,'') OR VALUE(E.CS126_UHJ,'') > VALUE(J.JHD,'') OR VALUE(F.CS126_UHJ,'') > VALUE(J.JHD,'') OR VALUE(J.JHD,'') = '' OR VALUE(J.JHD,'') > #GIJUN# OR VALUE(H.UHJ,'') > VALUE(J.JHD,'')) AND (VALUE(K.MDT,'') = '' OR VALUE(K.MDT,'') > #GIJUN# ) AND (VALUE(B.HST,'') <> 'D' OR (B.HST = 'D' AND VALUE(K.PJO,'') > '')) ) A LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZLCODE B ON B.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND A.ARA = B.CODE2 AND B.CODE1 = 'CS115' AND B.LANG = 'ko' LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZWBT010 C ON C.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND A.BSU = C.LGORT AND C.LGORT > '' LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZUSERF D ON D.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND A.JUJ = D.USERNUMB LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZUSERF E ON E.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND A.BPM = E.USERNUMB WHERE A.PJT <> '101726'
AND C.VKGRP = #VKGRP#
GROUP BY A.ARA, A.BSU, A.BPM, A.JUJ, A.PJT ) A )A
WHERE MI_M > #MONTH# OR ME_M > #MONTH# OR UE_M > #MONTH#
WITH UR
